mapper.select: SELECT topic_id, student_id, advisor_id, topic_name, submission_file_id, status, submitted_at, updated_at, professional_leader_feedback, hospital_leader_feedback, deleted FROM topic_submissions WHERE deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO topic_submissions (topic_id, student_id, advisor_id, topic_name, submission_file_id, status, professional_leader_feedback, hospital_leader_feedback) VALUES (#{topicId}, #{studentId}, #{advisorId}, #{topicName}, #{submissionFileId}, #{status}, #{professionalLeaderFeedback}, #{hospitalLeaderFeedback})
